subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: David Kahn is getting pummeled in some quarters for failing to sign Ricky Rubio, but for all of his talent, Rubio is widely regarded as an unfinished product.
snippet: David Kahn is getting pummeled in some quarters for failing to sign Ricky Rubio, but for all of his talent, Rubio is widely regarded as an unfinished product.
